import React from 'react'; import '../../../Screens/ProductScreen.css'; import Rating from '../../../Rating/Rating.js'; import BoysShoesData from './BoysShoesData'; export default function BoysShoesProductScreen(props) { const product = BoysShoesData.bShoes.find((x) => x._id === props.match.params.id); if (!product) { return
product Not Found
; } return (

  • {product.name}

  • Rs. {product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    Rs. {product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock > 0 ? ( In Stock ) : ( Unavailable )}
); }
